column4: hey... what file should i add the comand: tint2 -c ~/tint2.conf    to start tint2 at startup? rc.local didnt work
ok now what file should i add it to?
uh? im going to use rc.local... do i need quotes or just put the command there? before exit 0?
use full path to app, full path to config-file
ooh full path to app too :P
no just a panel for ubuntu
then rc.local will fail. use autostart on login
no clue how that is done in openbox
you mount your / somewhere, say /mnt. then you mount --bind /sys /mnt/sys, mount -t proc /nmt/proc, mount --bind /dev /mnt/dev. then you chroot into it and issue your command : chroot /mnt /bin/bash
